items.title: The women at the centre of Somalia's construction boom
items.description: Mogadishu's rapid expansion after decades of war is giving unexpected opportunities in a male-dominated society.

items.title: Race to mine metals for EV batteries threatens marine paradise
items.description: Photographs appear to show how nickel mining damaged one the world's most diverse marine environments

items.title: The first trial of its kind: A Russian soldier takes the stand for an execution
items.description: Dmitriy Kurashov is the first Russian soldier to stand trial in Ukraine over a battlefield execution.

items.title: Paternity leave: How much time off work do new dads get across Europe?
items.description: Most dads in the UK get two weeks off work after their baby is born, but dads in many European countries get more.

items.title: Macron visits Greenland in show of European unity and signal to Trump
items.description: France's Emmanuel Macron is visiting Greenland to hold talks on North Atlantic and Arctic security, climate change and critical minerals.
